alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ADAMS...SOUTHWESTERN YORK AND SOUTH CENTRAL CUMBERLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Carlisle to Gettysburg to near Thurmont. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Hanover, Weigelstown, Gettysburg, Parkville, Hampton, Shiloh, West York, Littlestown, Carroll Valley, Codorus, McSherrystown, Lake Meade, Spring Grove, Dover, Pennville, Bonneauville, New Oxford, East Berlin, Lake Heritage and Cashtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
